file_content.text: We're analyzing your Flesh Raider findings. In time, balance may be restored to Tython.
I've studied the Flesh Raiders' idols. Here are my notes.
Hmm, these idols appear to record the Flesh Raiders' hunting patterns. Master Gehnso will be ecstatic.
With more research into your findings, we may finally learn what motivates the Flesh Raiders. Through knowledge, we may calm their appetite.
I'll spread the word among the Pilgrims, Padawan. May the Force guide you in your training.
The Pilgrims will learn of your bravery. May the Force be with you.
The Pilgrims grow nervous. Please examine the idols quickly.
Can you sense the Pilgrims' suffering, Padawan? If not, just look at them.
Good of you to venture outside the Jedi Temple. Our presence calms these Pilgrims, but it isn't enough. Just look at them.
Bloodshot eyes, scarred lekku, exhaustion carved into their faces. They're scared for their lives, and for good reason.
Flesh Raider attacks are up. Three in the past day. Just last night they dragged a dozen Pilgrims into the darkness.
It's our duty to protect the weak, and I think these Pilgrims qualify.
We must stop their attacks.
I agree completely.
Can't we move these Pilgrims away from Flesh Raiders' territory?
The Pilgrims should relocate.
The creatures hunt far to feed. Believe me, we've tested their hunger.
These Pilgrims deserve a better fate.
That's awful.
There are those of us who try to prevent their suffering.
Sounds like a Pilgrim matter.
I've been studying the Flesh Raiders with Master Gehnso. We hope to elucidate the creatures' culture and learn what drives their hunger.
Pilgrim stories claim the Flesh Raiders' twisted appetite stems from the idols they worship. We've confirmed the idols' existence, but questions remain.
What do these idols represent? Do they motivate the Flesh Raiders' cravings? We need answers, and that means examining the idols up close--a dangerous task.
If these idols are the key to understanding the Flesh Raiders, I'll study them at once.
I will do it.
Thank you.
I like danger.
We share similar tastes. But our duty to these Pilgrims demands caution.
Mark down every detail about the idols; size, temperature, markings--everything. Look on them, and know the Flesh Raider heart.
When you're finished, I'll take your findings, or you may hand them over to Master Gehnso. You'll find her near the Jedi Temple.
I can't help. [Refuse quest]
Very well. Master Gehnso won't be happy. Neither will these Pilgrims.
Will the suffering never end?
